mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Member_individual(serial, mid, pwd, question, answer, irum, post, address1, address2, phone, email, gender, mdate, area, mileage, photo) VALUES(seq_user.nextval, #{mid}, #{pwd}, #{question}, #{answer}, #{irum}, #{post}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{phone} || '-' || #{phone2} || '-' || #{phone3}, #{email} || '@' || #{email2}, #{gender}, #{mdate}, #{area}, 0, #{photo} )

INSERT INTO Member_company(serial, mid, pwd, question, answer, delegate, company_number, post, address1, address2, phone, email, business_type, bank, account_number, area, hit, mileage, photo) VALUES(seq_user.nextval, #{mid}, #{pwd}, #{question}, #{answer}, #{delegate}, #{company_number}, #{post}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{phone} || '-' || #{phone2} || '-' || #{phone3}, #{email} || '@' || #{email2}, #{business_type}, #{bank}, #{account_number}, #{area}, 0, 0, #{photo})
mapper.select: SELECT mid FROM Member_individual WHERE mid = #{_parameter}
SELECT mid FROM Member_company WHERE mid = #{_parameter}
SELECT count(*) FROM Member_individual WHERE mid = #{mid} and pwd = #{pwd}
SELECT count(*) FROM Member_company WHERE mid = #{mid} and pwd = #{pwd}

SELECT serial, mid, pwd, question, answer, irum, post, address1, address2, phone, email, gender, to_char(mdate,'yyyy-MM-dd') mdate, area, mileage, photo FROM Member_individual WHERE mid = #{_parameter}

SELECT serial, mid, pwd, question, answer, delegate, company_number, post, address1, address2, phone, email, business_type, bank, account_number, area, hit, mileage, photo FROM Member_company WHERE mid = #{_parameter}
SELECT * FROM Member_individual WHERE irum = #{irum} and email = #{email}
SELECT * FROM Member_company WHERE delegate = #{irum} and email = #{email}
SELECT * FROM Member_individual WHERE irum = #{irum} and phone = #{phone} || '-' || #{phone2} || '-' || #{phone3}
SELECT * FROM Member_company WHERE delegate = #{irum} and phone = #{phone} || '-' || #{phone2} || '-' || #{phone3}
select count(*) totSize from Member_individual where mid like '%${_parameter}%' or irum like'%${_parameter}%'
select count(*) totSize from Member_company where mid like '%${_parameter}%' or delegate like '%${_parameter}%'
